function.name: list_documents
function.description: List processed documents with optional filtering. Can filter by document type, beneficiary, AFV presence, and discharge eligibility. Supports pagination for large result sets.

afv_present.description: Filter by AFV notation presence (true = only documents with AFV, false = only without)

discharge_eligible.description: Filter by discharge eligibility (true = only eligible, false = only not eligible)

returns.description: List of documents with pagination information
